item.title: Excerpts from Putins speech on Crimea
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made his case for taking Crimea back from Ukraine and explained his decision to defy the West despite the threat of sanctions
item.itunes:subtitle: Russian President Vladimir Putin made his case for taking Crimea back from Ukraine and explained his decision to defy the West despite the threat of sanctions
item.itunes:summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin made his case for taking Crimea back from Ukraine and explained his decision to defy the West despite the threat of sanctions

item.title: Thieves steal part of Pompeii fresco
item.description: A custodian doing rounds last week discovered the removal of a part of a fresco in the House of Neptune where a depiction of the goddess Artemis had been chiseled off with a metallic object the Roman sites curator department said in a statement Tuesday
item.itunes:subtitle: A custodian doing rounds last week discovered the removal of a part of a fresco in the House of Neptune where a depiction of the goddess Artemis had been chiseled off with a metallic object the Roman sites curator department said in a statement Tuesday&nb
item.itunes:summary: A custodian doing rounds last week discovered the removal of a part of a fresco in the House of Neptune where a depiction of the goddess Artemis had been chiseled off with a metallic object the Roman sites curator department said in a statement Tuesday

item.title: Welcome to Republic of Crimea the worlds newest statelet
item.description: Its borders are patrolled by Russian troops and it adopted the ruble on its first day of independence welcome to the worlds latest pariah statelet Republic of Crimea
item.itunes:subtitle: Its borders are patrolled by Russian troops and it adopted the ruble on its first day of independence welcome to the worlds latest pariah statelet Republic of Crimea

item.title: Cold War reflexes return to Europe over Ukraine
item.description: The Cold War is back Russias military seizure of Crimea and preparations for a possible annexation of the southern Ukrainian province have revived fears calculations and reflexes that had been rusting away since the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989

item.title: Vatican Anglicans Muslims unite to fight slavery
item.description: Catholics Anglicans and Muslims came togethernbspon Tuesdaynbspto fight slavery with the launch of a global network to tackle human trafficking forced prostitution and child labour
item.itunes:subtitle: Catholics Anglicans and Muslims came togethernbspon Tuesdaynbspto fight slavery with the launch of a global network to tackle human trafficking forced prostitution and child labour
item.itunes:summary: Catholics Anglicans and Muslims came togethernbspon Tuesdaynbspto fight slavery with the launch of a global network to tackle human trafficking forced prostitution and child labour

item.title: BBC apologises for undercover trip to North Korea
item.description: The BBC apologised on Monday to a leading British university for sending two undercover reporters to accompany an academic trip to North Korea after an internal investigation found that it had failed to inform students of the potential risks
item.itunes:subtitle: The BBC apologised on Monday to a leading British university for sending two undercover reporters to accompany an academic trip to North Korea after an internal investigation found that it had failed to inform students of the potential risks  &n
item.itunes:summary: The BBC apologised on Monday to a leading British university for sending two undercover reporters to accompany an academic trip to North Korea after an internal investigation found that it had failed to inform students of the potential risks

item.title: Suicide attack kills 15 in north Afghanistan officials
item.description: A suicide bomber on a threewheeled motorbike killed at least 15 people in northern Afghanistan on Tuesday when he detonated his explosives in a crowded market officials said
item.itunes:subtitle: A suicide bomber on a threewheeled motorbike killed at least 15 people in northern Afghanistan on Tuesday when he detonated his explosives in a crowded market officials said
item.itunes:summary: A suicide bomber on a threewheeled motorbike killed at least 15 people in northern Afghanistan on Tuesday when he detonated his explosives in a crowded market officials said

item.title: Paris lifts partial car ban after drop in pollution
item.description: Paris on Monday banned all cars with even number plates for the first time in nearly 20 years to fight skyhigh pollution but opted not to extend the measure after an improvement in air quality
item.itunes:subtitle: Paris on Monday banned all cars with even number plates for the first time in nearly 20 years to fight skyhigh pollution but opted not to extend the measure after an improvement in air quality
item.itunes:summary: Paris on Monday banned all cars with even number plates for the first time in nearly 20 years to fight skyhigh pollution but opted not to extend the measure after an improvement in air quality

item.title: AgustaWestland Italy judge rejects India bid to recover guarantees
item.description: An Italian judge has rejected a request by India to recover more than 278 million euros in bank guarantees backing a scrapped helicopter deal with Finmeccanica the Italian defence group said on Monday
item.itunes:subtitle: An Italian judge has rejected a request by India to recover more than 278 million euros in bank guarantees backing a scrapped helicopter deal with Finmeccanica the Italian defence group said on Monday
item.itunes:summary: An Italian judge has rejected a request by India to recover more than 278 million euros in bank guarantees backing a scrapped helicopter deal with Finmeccanica the Italian defence group said on Monday

item.title: Celebrated fashion designer LWren Scott Mick Jaggers girlfriend found dead in NY
item.description: Scott a former model whose slimfitting dresses were favorites among Hollywoods Alist stars such as Nicole Kidman Amy Adams and Penelope Cruz was found hanging from a scarf in her Manhattan apartment on Monday
item.itunes:subtitle: Scott a former model whose slimfitting dresses were favorites among Hollywoods Alist stars such as Nicole Kidman Amy Adams and Penelope Cruz was found hanging from a scarf in her Manhattan apartment on Monday
item.itunes:summary: Scott a former model whose slimfitting dresses were favorites among Hollywoods Alist stars such as Nicole Kidman Amy Adams and Penelope Cruz was found hanging from a scarf in her Manhattan apartment on Monday

item.title: Russia recognises Crimea as a sovereign state
item.description: The United States and European Union imposed personal sanctions on Monday on Russian and Crimean officials involved in the seizure of Crimea from Ukraine as Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a decree recognising the region as a sovereign state Yen nurses losses euro edges up

item.title: Seven ways Pistoriuss attackdog lawyer mauls witnesses
item.description: Oscar Pistoriuss defence lawyer Barry Roux has set his murder trial alight with bruising questioning of state witnesses but behind the bluster lie a few basic longused techniques of crossexamination

item.title: US EU impose sanctions on Russians as Crimea votes to split from Ukraine
item.description: The United States on Monday imposed sanctions on seven Russians including close aides of President Vladimir Putin and four Ukrainians blamed for Russias military incursion into Crimea

item.title: Crimeas 6 steps towards joining Russia after Sovietstyle vote
item.description: Crimea launched a raft of measures on Monday to facilitate its entry into Russia a day after the separatist region voted overwhelmingly to split from Ukraine Here is a summary of its first political economic and military steps

item.title: Moscow wins overwhelming Crimea vote West readies sanctions
item.description: Crimeas Moscowbacked leaders declared a 96 vote in favour of quitting Ukraine and annexation by Russia in a referendum Western powers said was illegal and will bring immediate sanctions Know about Crimeas referendumnbsp Moscow wins Crimea vote West readies sanctions

item.title: Osama aide had no role in al Qaeda 911 architect
item.description: The selfdescribed mastermind of the September 11 2001 terror attacks in the US says the onetime Osama bin Laden spokesman who is on trial in New York had no role in planning military operations for al Qaeda
item.itunes:subtitle: The selfdescribed mastermind of the September 11 2001 terror attacks in the US says the onetime Osama bin Laden spokesman who is on trial in New York had no role in planning military operations for al Qaeda
item.itunes:summary: The selfdescribed mastermind of the September 11 2001 terror attacks in the US says the onetime Osama bin Laden spokesman who is on trial in New York had no role in planning military operations for al Qaeda

item.title: In China Michelle Obama to stay firmly in mom in chief mode
item.description: US first lady Michelle Obama is expected to steer clear of controversial issues such as human rights when she visits China this week but her trip could help advance a top item on her husbands foreign policy agenda deepening Washingtons ties with Beijing
item.itunes:subtitle: US first lady Michelle Obama is expected to steer clear of controversial issues such as human rights when she visits China this week but her trip could help advance a top item on her husbands foreign policy agenda deepening Washingtons ties with Beijing&n
item.itunes:summary: US first lady Michelle Obama is expected to steer clear of controversial issues such as human rights when she visits China this week but her trip could help advance a top item on her husbands foreign policy agenda deepening Washingtons ties with Beijing

item.title: Strong quake hits Chiles North coast no damage
item.description: A strong quake struck off northern Chile on Sunday evening triggering a brief evacuation of part of the coastal area but not causing any injuries or significant damage
item.itunes:subtitle: A strong quake struck off northern Chile on Sunday evening triggering a brief evacuation of part of the coastal area but not causing any injuries or significant damage
item.itunes:summary: A strong quake struck off northern Chile on Sunday evening triggering a brief evacuation of part of the coastal area but not causing any injuries or significant damage

item.title: As Russia closes in Ukrainians fearful defiant
item.description: As shown by Crimean voters and eastern protesters seeking autonomy many Ukrainians feel cut off from a Russian homeland by arbitrary postSoviet borders But they are in a minority albeit concentrated in big industrial cities near Russia Know about Crimeas referendumnbsp Moscow wins Crimea vote West readies sanctions

item.title: After Sovietstyle vote Crimea asks to join Russia West mulls sanctions
item.description: Crimea formally applied to join Russia on Monday after its leaders declared a Sovietstyle 97 vote in favour of quitting Ukraine in a referendum condemned as illegal by Kiev and the West that will trigger immediate sanctions Know about Crimeas referendum
item.itunes:subtitle: Crimea formally applied to join Russia on Monday after its leaders declared a Sovietstyle 97 vote in favour of quitting Ukraine in a referendum condemned as illegal by Kiev and the West that will trigger immediate sanctions Know about Crimeas referendum&n
item.itunes:summary: Crimea formally applied to join Russia on Monday after its leaders declared a Sovietstyle 97 vote in favour of quitting Ukraine in a referendum condemned as illegal by Kiev and the West that will trigger immediate sanctions Know about Crimeas referendum

item.title: Britain hands over bases to Afghan forces
item.description: Britain has handed over all but two of its remaining bases in Afghanistans Helmand Province to local forces as part of its planned full withdrawal by the end of 2014 the ministry of defence MoD announced on Sunday
item.itunes:subtitle: Britain has handed over all but two of its remaining bases in Afghanistans Helmand Province to local forces as part of its planned full withdrawal by the end of 2014 the ministry of defence MoD announced on Sunday
item.itunes:summary: Britain has handed over all but two of its remaining bases in Afghanistans Helmand Province to local forces as part of its planned full withdrawal by the end of 2014 the ministry of defence MoD announced on Sunday

item.title: Crimea votes overwhelming 95 to leave Ukraine for Russia Report
item.description: Crimeans voted overwhelmingly to break away from Ukraine and join Russia in a referendum on Sunday that has alarmed the former Soviet republic and triggered the worst crisis in EastWest relations since the Cold War Know about Crimeas referendum
item.itunes:subtitle: Crimeans voted overwhelmingly to break away from Ukraine and join Russia in a referendum on Sunday that has alarmed the former Soviet republic and triggered the worst crisis in EastWest relations since the Cold War Know about Crimeas referendum &nbsp
item.itunes:summary: Crimeans voted overwhelmingly to break away from Ukraine and join Russia in a referendum on Sunday that has alarmed the former Soviet republic and triggered the worst crisis in EastWest relations since the Cold War Know about Crimeas referendum

item.title: Proud Bihari Asha Khemka gets Damehood from Prince Charles
item.description: Asha Khemka who arrived here with family from Sitamarhi in Bihar in 1978 without any English language skills and went to change the lives of thousands as a leading educationist received her Damehood from Prince Charles on Friday
item.itunes:subtitle: Asha Khemka who arrived here with family from Sitamarhi in Bihar in 1978 without any English language skills and went to change the lives of thousands as a leading educationist received her Damehood from Prince Charles on Friday

item.title: Oscar Pistorius trial becomes a popular culture spectacle
item.description: Big audiences in South Africa are watching a 24hour television channel dedicated to coverage of the sensational trial Turns of phrase from the courtroom the defense lawyers I put it to you challenge to prosecution witnesses are creeping into popular culture
item.itunes:subtitle: Big audiences in South Africa are watching a 24hour television channel dedicated to coverage of the sensational trial Turns of phrase from the courtroom the defense lawyers I put it to you challenge to prosecution witnesses are creeping into popular cultu

item.title: 100 killed in Nigeria as gunmen storm villages
item.description: nbspAt least 100 people were killed in the religiously divided centre of Nigeria this weekend local officials said on Sunday as tensions between Muslimdominated herdsmen and mostly Christian farmers again turned deadly
item.itunes:subtitle: nbspAt least 100 people were killed in the religiously divided centre of Nigeria this weekend local officials said on Sunday as tensions between Muslimdominated herdsmen and mostly Christian farmers again turned deadly
item.itunes:summary: nbspAt least 100 people were killed in the religiously divided centre of Nigeria this weekend local officials said on Sunday as tensions between Muslimdominated herdsmen and mostly Christian farmers again turned deadly
